author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Reads event input from a special ROOT file created from a detailed study of the beam line elements

#### PR validation:

Tested using a private configuration file (also added in this PR). The required file will be added later by Shahzad in the area SimG4CMS/HGCalTestBeam/data

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special for bak porting
title: Run3-TB41 Add a special particle gun for HGCal TB studies
